Welcome to KForge Package Documentation
=========================================

`KForge package <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/kforge>`_ documentation covers how to use KForge software.

If you are interested in KForge, please join the `Mailing list <http://lists.appropriatesoftware.org/listinfo/kforge-discuss>`_.


* The `Introduction <introduction.html>`_ provides an **overview** of the KForge package.
* The `Install Guide <install-guide.html>`_ describes **how to install** the KForge software and **how to setup** a KForge site.
* The `User Guide <user-guide.html>`_ details **how to use** a KForge site.
* The `Administration Guide <admin-guide.html>`_ describes **how to configure and maintain** a KForge site.
* The `Plugin Guide <plugin-guide.html>`_ describes how to **enhance and extend** a KForge site.
* The `Design Guide <design-guide.html>`_ describes the **internal structure** of KForge.
